attributes.action: Voters to strike at all elections until a pathway to EU membership is opened.
attributes.additional_details: No one should be allowed to remove another persons citizenship or rights against their wishes and unfortunalty this has been allowed to happen this is a great crime and it needs overturning
attributes.background: Parliament should encourge citizens to withold their support for parties that refuse to offer a pathway to restore EU citizenship

rejection.details:
The decision on whether or not to vote in general elections is a personal choice for eligible voters, not the UK Government or Parliament. It is further for individual MPs whether they wish to encourage their constituents to vote or not.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552263
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550951
